channel.title: Comments on: Today’s link-a-palooza
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
Since when being a geek became cool?? And in case I am one, I would still like to have the nitro gas powered RC boat over one of these watches.
And if you ask me I would say that a Pill Takers Cup is a nice low tech gadget that may help farmers provide plants with green fluorescent marker gene ;-)
item.content:encoded:
Since when being a geek became cool?? And in case I am one, I would still like to have the nitro gas powered RC boat over one of these watches.

And if you ask me I would say that a Pill Takers Cup is a nice low tech gadget that may help farmers provide plants with green fluorescent marker gene ;-)
